QuestData.Title: A Port in Peril
QuestData.Description:
A group of mogu have taken hold of Warport Rastari and now threaten to encroach further into my city.
It would seem Zul is losing his grip over his pets.
Dat port is vital to our military fleet. If de brutes succeed, Zuldazar will fall, and dere won't be a fleet to aid your precious Horde.
You wish to prove yourself an ally of de Zandalari? Meet my blade and shield at de port and clean up dis mess.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Habutu and Zolani at Warport Rastari.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Habutu and Zolani at Warport Rastari.
